text: The Victoria's Secret Fashion Show is almost here, and every year the lingerie runway event is televised to millions, who watch gorgeous models strut their stuff down the catwalk. Then, the funny reaction tweets inevitably roll in summing up the show like this. Just ordered three large pizzas to watch girls in underwear walk. # VSFashionShow — Sarah Hyland ( @ Sarah _ Hyland ) December 6, 2016 This is me while pictures of @ VictoriasSecret models keep popping up on my timeline # VSFS2016 # VictoriaSecretFashionShow pic. twitter. com / NOgPbfyEOf — Lakisha Jackson ( @ LakishaJackson ) November 30, 2016 But model Tabria Major
